ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] First time I was lucky.  Second time cursed by the RNG?
ygData.msgSnippet: Paying 10 pp to loot griffenne charm is a frequent shout in NK on my server...at 28, griffennes have to be kited if I am solo and twice this week I have
ygData.messageBody:
"Paying 10 pp to loot griffenne charm" is a frequent
shout in NK on my server...at 28, griffennes have to
be kited if I am solo and twice this week I have
fallen afoul of Grimfeather, lost three griffennes to
wondering guards and had to zone numerous times due to

flying friends of my erstwhile victim ... and once
because of a hill giant deciding to join in the fun.

Then I see a 17th lvl bard dressed in blue. A quick
greeting and I find he also has a mistmoore drum.
sigh...

--- "Reece, Tom CPT- 25IDL G4"
<g4mntofcr@...> wrote:

> I guess I got spoiled in that the first two
> griffenes I killed dropped
> charms. Not certain how rare the drop is so I guess
> not looting one on five
> attempts is nothing to get too concerned over. Its
> just a nuisiance at this
> point. IIRC, someone posted a long time ago on the
> list a method to
> guarantee a griffenne would spawn. The poster
> mentioned a /loc to go to
> somewhere in NK. Does anyone remember the details
> of this post? Also, I
> recall someone saying that the only mobs who were
> placeholders for
> griffennes were griffawns. Killing the other mobs
> in NK will not increase
> the chances of getting a griffenne to spawn. Is
> that true?
>
> Thanks
> Galtin of E'ci
>
>
